description: Erection of single storey rear extension (3.3m in depth, maximum height of 3.0m and eaves height of 2.2m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension and alterations fall within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Details required for Condition 7 ( Secure Cycle, Scooter and Buggy Parking) of planning permission 22/01964/FUL(Change of use of existing school building (Use Class F.1) to Child Nursery (Use Class E(f)) and associated minor external works.)Plans, elevations and details of the cycle, buggy and scooter parking has been submitted and asessed by officers. The storage would be secure (within a gated enclosure) and sheltererd, other than the short stay visitor cycle parking which is accepted. The overall level of provision aligns with that agreed through the parent permission. Overall, the details are considered to be acceptable.

For the avoidance of doubt, please confirm the description 'Partial change of use of one of the existing habitable rooms into a servery kiosk for selling professionally prepared hot food and beverage with associated landscaping and installation of canopy.
